charges.charge_description: 21:841A=CD.F CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE-SELL, DISTRIBUTE, OR DISPENSE-On or about [7/28/06], in Peoria County, within the CDIL, the Dft did knowingly possess 5 grams or more of a substance containing cocaine base (crack), a Schedule II controlled substance, with intent to distribute in violation of Title 21, USC Section 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B) (1)

18:924C.F-VIOLENT CRIME/DRUGS/MACHINE GUN-On or about [7/28/06], in Peoria County, within the CDIL, Dft did knowingly possess a firearm, a 9mm Smith &; Wesson pistol, in furtherance of a drug trafficking crime which may be prosecuted in a court of the U.S. in violation of Title 18, USC Section 924(c) (2)

21:841B=ND.F From on or about [7/28/06] in Peoria County in the CDIL, Dft did knowingly possess with the intent to distribute more than five grams of a mixture and substance containing cocaine base, crack, in violation of 21 USC 841(a)(1) and (b)(1)(B).
